name: Gradient Blob Hero

author: Santiago Sanint
description: A sleek and modern AI chat interface with a dark theme, gradient message bubbles, and user avatars.

author: Santiago Sanint
description: A customizable canvas-based starry night effect with twinkling stars.

author: Santiago Sanint
description: An interactive background with a wave effect on a grid of blocks.

name: Wave Path Border
author: Santiago Sanint
description: An animated border with a flowing wave path effect.

name: Spotlight Card Border
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A card with a spotlight effect that follows the cursor around its border.

author: Santiago Sanint
description: A call to action with a gradient glow effect.

name: Spinning Logos
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A dynamic display of client logos spinning in a circle.

name: Lightning Split View
author: Santiago Sanint
description: An interactive split-view for before/after comparisons.

name: 3D Orbit Gallery
author: Santiago Sanint
description: A gallery of features displayed in a 3D orbit.

description: An image grid with a distortion effect on scroll.

name: Interactive Globe
author: Santiago Sanint
description: An interactive 3D globe.

name: Scroll-linked Spring Animation
description: A spring-based animation that is linked to scroll position.

name: Black Hole Shader
description: A mesmerizing black hole shader effect.

name: 3D Testimonials
